thread.title: MDMA Rejection Raises New Questions On Psychedelic Drug Clinical Trials
thread.title_full: MDMA Rejection Raises New Questions On Psychedelic Drug Clinical Trials

author: MENAFN
title: MDMA Rejection Raises New Questions On Psychedelic Drug Clinical Trials
text:
( MENAFN - Investor Brand Network) The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) recently
rejected an application
to approve the use of MDMA as a treatment for post-traumatic stress disorder (PTSD). The MDMA formulation, developed by Lykos Therapeutics, would have been administered in combination with psychotherapy if it had been approved.
In its rejection, the federal agency requested for more clinical trials to be done to gather additional data on the drug's effectiveness and...
Read More>>
